priorityRules.1: Gives you a skippable message which blocks videos.
priorityRules.2: Displays only the first 5 elements of a youtube page.
priorityRules.3: Blocks videos unless a timeout is chosen.

priorityRules.1: Gives you a skippable message warns you about feed-scrolling.
priorityRules.2: Shows only 10 tweets on home page.
priorityRules.3: Blocks videos unless a timeout is chosen.

priorityRules.1: Gives you a skippable message warns you about feed-scrolling.
priorityRules.2: Shows only 5 posts on home page.
priorityRules.3: Blocks videos unless a timeout is chosen.
